author: Anand Sinha
title: Elon Musk's Tesla loses ground as Japanese rival takes the lead
description: The race among companies to hold Bitcoin on their balance sheets heats up.
content:
Elon Musk's Tesla loses ground as Japanese rival takes the lead originally appeared on TheStreet.
